text: Uha alaha hi hai jihara tuhanu thala ate jala vica cala'unda hai isa la'i jadom tusim kisati vica hude ho ate kisati'am lokam nu lai ke hava de anukula cala rahi'am hudi'am hana ate loka isa tom' khusa hude hana uthana lagadi'am hana ate uha socade hana ki asim ghira ga'e. Usa vele uha apane dina (dharama) nu sirapha alaha la'i hi kendarita karake usa nu pukarade hana. Jekara tu sanu isa tom baca li'a tam nisacita rupa vica asim tere sukara guzara bade banage
